header.title: Colorization
header.body: Upload a png or jpg image to and see it colorized.

instructions.title: How To
instructions.body: Click the begin button to get started with uploading your image, You can click the samples below to examine colorization exmaples.

uploader.title: Upload
uploader.body:
click the button to upload your image or video (coming soon).
Click the image to view.
